name: 特殊教育學生溝通能力與問題專題
restrict: ◎必須先修過【SPD0012  溝通障礙論題與趨勢】 ◎課程不開放上修
description: 透過參與特殊教育學生溝通能力與問題研究的機會，學習學術研究的歷程(含計畫擬定、執行、資料收集、分析、撰寫報告等)，並強化撰寫學術研究計畫與報告的能力。
goals: 透過參與研究計畫，學習計畫撰寫、執行和資料分析之方法
透過文獻探討，增進分析與統整溝通障礙相關文獻的能力
實際運用適當的研究方法，擬定研究計畫和執行研究
syllabus:
Week #1 Orientations and discussions  
Week #2 Contemporary approaches to study of language and literacy  
Week #3 Methodological issues in research on language and literacy  
Week #4 Issues on Specific language impairment (SLI)  
Week #5 Issues on Specific language impairment (SLI)  
Week #6 Language processes underlying atypical literacy learning: Auditory perception  
Week #7 Language processes underlying atypical literacy learning: speech perception  
Week #8 Language processes underlying atypical literacy learning: Phonological processing  
Week #9 Language processes underlying atypical literacy learning: Lexical processing  
Week #10 Language disorders and dyslexia  
Week #11 Topic discussion: Independent Study  
Week #12 Literature review: Independent Study  
Week #13 Literature review: Independent Study  
Week #14 Literature review: Independent Study  
Week #15 Proposal writing & discussion  
Week #16 Proposal writing & discussion  
Week #17 Proposal writing & discussion  
Week #18 Proposal presentation (paper due)
prerequisite: ◎必須先修過【SPD0012  溝通障礙論題與趨勢】
